content: CITI PremierMiles Visa Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Oct 2018What is the best credit card promotion when applying for Citibank PremierMiles credit card as an existing Citibank customer?Seems like the promotions are only available for new Citibank users.
